main: ^In the far far future, Humans have made a groundbreaking discovery...
^Through many trials and tribulations, mankind has since learned to coexist with alienkind.
^Eventually leading to the colonization of the moon.
^since then humans and aliens have lived on both planets, working together to build a brighter future.
^You slowly open your eyes to the blinding sunlight piercing through the blinds to illuminate your sleep deprived face.
^The sound of your alarm fills your killing urges as you get out of bed to face the day.
^Suddenly, you receive a message on your phone
^"REMEMBER, DON'T BE LATE TO YOUR FIRST DAY!!! - B.0.5.5.M.4.N."
^You rush to get out the door and put on your spacesuit, from how intense your interview was you get the feeling that
^You really don't want to piss your new boss off.
^Here it is, Moon Dust Café. The start of your new life, the beginning of new opportunities.
^And hopefully... the place where you find: The One.*
^LATE ON YOUR FIRST DAY? HAVE YOU NO SHAME?
^Well... you're new so i guess i'll forgive you this time.
^The robot rolls back, a loading symbol appears on his face before it changes to a much more relaxed expression.
^I believe introductions are in order, I am Bossbot 055 Model 4 Neo, you can address me as B.0.5.5.M.4.N.
^Welcome to the Moondust Cafe recruit. Let me lead you to your station, don't fall behind now.
^He leads you over behind the counter and begins to explain your position at the cafe.
^You're in charge of taking order and serving them, should be simple enough?
^He hands you a uniform and then rolls away into the unknown.
^You've now been left alone in an empty cafe with nothing but the hum of the cooling systems.
^Suddenly you hear the entrance bell ring out.
^"Ah hello there! Lovely morning isn't it?"
^A large orange alien wearing a leather jacket and flight goggles approached the counter with a smile on his face.
^I don’t think I’ve ever seen you here before... are you new here by chance?
^Oh, how exciting, I love to see new faces around here!
^He then takes a minute to order his meal before you ask for his name.
^Ah of course! My name’s Eshu and it’s wonderful to meet you!
^He holds out his hand to shake yours when suddenly
^he door is suddenly kicked open as a four-armed four eyed alien woman walks in like she owns the place
^Well now what do we have here?
^he walks up to counter and pushes Eshu to the side before tilting your head with a finger.
^My my, A human working at the café? I never thought I would see the day!
^Now then, are you going to take my order human?
^You begrudgingly ask the red alien for her name.
^I’m sorry you don’t know me? I am QUEEN Astrill!!! Future ruler of the galaxy!
^Hey back off. I don’t know what your deal is but if you think you  can just barge in here like-
^you’re some kind of royalty then you got another thing coming.
^Ohohoho! Looks like someone thinks they can save the day! By all means big boy... just try and stop me.
^Hey! Will you two knock it off? Your meals are getting cold.
^You place the food on the table as Eshu and Astrill begin to calm down
^Very well then... we’ll call it a draw.
^The two sit down to enjoy their meals and as Eshu puts the first bite into his mouth...
^He looks at you with a starry-eyed look on his face.
^I don’t know what you put in this but this tastes incredible!
^Oh please... surely food prepared by this Human is no different then the ones made by my minions...
^Astrill takes a bite of her food
^..Oh my stars, the taste... it’s exquistite. Human I demand to know what you
^It’s nothing really just a simple family recipe.
^Well I think it’s wonderful! You wouldn’t mind sharing the recipe would you?
^Oh nonono Human, you must give the recipe to me! With this I could have the entire galaxy kneel before my delicious cooking!
^Well... if you want you can come back whenever I’m off shift and I could teach you how to make it?
^I’d like that very much, thank you!
^Hmmm, I suppose I’ll take you up on your offer...
^Right then... come back tomorrow and I should be free.
^The two finish up their meals, pay the bill and head off.
^As the two exit, you suddenly feel a sense of confusion and dread.
^What have I just gotten myself into...
